MemoryInfobox.description: 'Roxana knew that to win the Battle of One Hundred Hands, a diverse mix of skills was required. One of these skills was archery.'

General_Description: '''Archery Practice''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met up with [[Roxana]] to continue their training for the [[Battle of One Hundred Hands]].
Section_Dialogue:
After sparring with Roxana, Kassandra accompanied her to the [[Hydrea Shipwreck|shipwreck]] on the coast of [[Hydrea]], which had been occupied by a pack of [[Wolf|wolves]]. (Went to shipwreck immediately) *'''Roxana:''' ''We're a safe distance here. Now shoot these cursed wolves before they start taking down the local children. I'll see if there isn't a thing or two I can learn from you.'' (Went to shipwreck later) *'''Roxana:''' ''You came! Good. We can get on with the training.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You said we'd be doing archery... but I don't see any targets.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''A ship wrecked here not long ago. It carried a pack of wolves to [[Melos]] as an added challenge to the Battle of One Hundred Hands.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And now they're running loose here on Hydrea?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Not for long.
Show me what you can do with that [[bow]] and put them down. Maybe I can learn a thing or two.'' Regardless, Kassandra commented on Roxana's choice for training. |-|Flirt – This time with you is nice.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's nice to be out here, just the two of us.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Is that right?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''There were a lot of onlookers when we sparred.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''You'll be happy to know the rest of our training will be more... private.'' |-|The wolves are no problem.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''A few wolves shouldn't be much trouble.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''These wolves were trained to be part of the Battle of One Hundred Hands, to ''attack'' and kill people. We can't have them running loose on [[Hydrea]].'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I see.'' |-|The wolves are a menace.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''We can't have so many wolves on an island this small. They'll terrorize the people living here.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''That's exactly right, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''. That's why we're here.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''On with the [[Hunting|hunt]]—I can always use more pelts.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''A true champion. I knew it! Ready your bow.'' Kassandra began taking aim at the animals. *'''Roxana:''' ''Look at you, all statuesque as you draw your bow.'' Kassandra slayed one of the wolves. *'''Kassandra:''' ''How'd you like that one?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Beautiful shot.'' Another one of the wolves fell. *'''Roxana:''' ''The way your muscles ripple when you draw the string—'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Do they ripple?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Do they ''ripple''.
They're works of art!'' :(If players entered melee) :*'''Roxana:''' ''What are you doing? This is supposed to be archery training!'' :*'''Kassandra:''' ''Do you want the wolves killed, or not?'' :*'''Roxana:''' ''Yes. Kill them.'' With the wolves dead, Roxana commented on the results of their training. |-|(Performed to Roxana's standards)= *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's done. All the wolves are dead.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''You elevate archery to an art form. Even [[Sophokles]] couldn't captivate me like that.'' |-|(Did not perform to Roxana's standards)= *'''Roxana:''' ''Not exactly the archery training I was hoping for.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''The wolves are dead. That's what matters.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''If you say so.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''How much more "''training''" will we do before I can enter the Battle?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''What, you don't want to spend more time with me?'' |-|Flirt – I'm enjoying this.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''This time with you has been-
I don't know what to say.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Say no more. In a strange way, I see my own reflection in you.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Yes. We've only just met and yet, we have a... connection.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''You're a unique creature, Kassandra.
There's one more step to our training.'' |-|I have other priorities.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I have other things to do. People to kill.'' *'''Roxana:''' ''Then you'll be happy to know we only have one last step in our training regimen.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Where to?'' *'''Roxana:''' ''My [[Hydrea Apple Farm|house]].''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra and Roxana finished the next step in their training regimen for the Battle of One Hundred Hands.
